scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher wading through water, carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher, a large man with a beard, holds a staff for support. The Christ Child, dressed in gold, holds a golden orb. In the background, a bearded figure holding a lantern stands on the shore, observing the crossing. The setting is a body of water with a light blue sky.
scene_interpretation: The Crossing of the Christ Child by Saint Christopher
